title: What's the lowest cut-off CGPA in PESU for an ECE student? Do they make ECE students sit for placements along with the CSE ones?

comments.body:
*"They make ece students sit for companies which allow ece students to sit, its not upto PES....if you're smart enough to qualify the coding round and technical interviews then the job is yours"*

~CSE Senior

I'm from CSE so I cannot comment about the CGPAs in ECE.

Yes, ECE students do sit for placements along with CSE kids for **almost all** companies.
Thanks! But what are those companies which exclude *almost all*?

I do not remember anymore since being in CSE I don't usually look at the eligible branches much, but there are only like 1-3 companies that do so. You don't have to be worried if you are from ECE and you would like to sit with the CSE kids for placements. All T-1 companies and almost all other ones will allow CSE and ECE kids to sit for their tests, and sometimes the EEE students too.
7/7.5 is cut off for most companies. 8 would be a good GPA to maintain safe margin.
